metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: DSA Syllabus
Introduction

links.text: W3Schools Data Structures and Algorithms Tutorial
links.title: W3Schools DSA Tutorial

content.text: The W3Schools Data Structures and Algorithms Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools Data Structures and Algorithms Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of data structures and algorithms.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of data structures and algorithms.

content.text: This tutorial is designed for beginners and requires only basic programming knowledge.
content.html: This tutorial is designed for beginners and requires only basic programming knowledge.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn DSA step by step, from basic data structures to advanced algorithms.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn DSA step by step, from basic data structures to advanced algorithms.

content.text: Get Started With DSA »
content.html: Get Started With DSA »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching DSA? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching DSA? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
DSA, like any programming topic, is best learned through hands-on practice.
content.html: DSA, like any programming topic, is best learned through hands-on practice.

content.text: Try this example using our editor:
content.html: Try this example using our editor:

content.code:
my_array
=

[
7
,

12
,

,

4
,

11
]

minVal
=
my_array
[

]

:

content.code_html:
my_array = [7, 12, 9, 4, 11]
minVal = my_array[0]

for i in my_array:
    if i < minVal:
        minVal = i

print('Lowest value:',minVal)

content.text: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to practice DSA implementations for free.
content.html: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to practice DSA implementations for free.

content.text: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice algorithms and test data structures in real-time.
content.html: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice algorithms and test data structures in real-time.

content.text: Spaces allow you to test, implement, and analyze code. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.
content.html: Spaces allow you to test, implement, and analyze code. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.

content.text: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.
content.html: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.

content.text: Features include:
content.html: Features include:

content.text: Create a Spaces Account
content.html: Create a Spaces Account

content.text: DSA Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The DSA exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools DSA syllabus.
content.html: The DSA exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools DSA syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified DSA Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified DSA Developer" Certification.

content.text: There are two different types of certifications:
content.html: There are two different types of certifications:

content.text: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.
content.html: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.

content.text: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: Buy Certificate »
content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach DSA?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach DSA?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
content.html: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
